activities:
In order to participate in our promotional sweepstakes, users may fill a participation form. Users may provide their first name, last name, date of birth, state, email address, telephone number and country of residence.
users may update their information at anytime

recoursemech: A form is provided on Mango Family's website and all complains can be sent through this form. Although, Mango Family will cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives upon request. The complains may also be sent at: Mango Family LLC,Trolley Square, Suite 20C, Wilmington, 19806, Delaware
